title: Demonstrates a Universe Meta Package
text: WARNING: admiralverse toy example. real code see pharmaverse.org. goal admiralverse model main use case dverse package. Explore source code package learn create minimal meta-package collection R packages (.e. universe), website allows users search vignettes, datasets, functions across entire universe.

title: Demonstrates a Universe Meta Package
text: can install development version admiralverse GitHub :
